entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 33. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
